#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

#define MOD 10007

using namespace std;

int pp[10000006];
bool primes[10000006];

void sieve()
{	
	for(int i = 1; i < 10000006; i++) primes[i] = true;
	primes[1] = false;
	for(int i = 2; i*i < 10000006; i++) {
		if(primes[i]) {
			for(int j = 2*i; j <= 10000006; j += i) {
				primes[j] = false;
			}
		}
	}
	memset(pp, 0, sizeof(pp));
	pp[1] = 0;
	pp[2] = 1;
	
	for(int i = 3; i < 10000006; i++) {
		pp[i] = pp[i-1];
		if(primes[i]) pp[i]++;
	}
	//cout << "hello\n";
}

int solve(int num, int p)
{
	if(p == 0) return 1;
	if(p == 1) return num;
	if(p % 2 == 0) {
		int temp = solve(num, p/2);
		return (temp*temp)%MOD;
	}
	else return (num*solve(num, p-1))%MOD;
}

int main()
{
	int n;
	sieve();
//	for(int i = 2; i < 100; i++) {
//		if(primes[i]) cout << i << endl;
//	}
	while(cin >> n) {
		if(n == 1) cout << 0 << endl;
		else {
			int cc = pp[n];
			cout << solve(2, cc-1) << endl;
		}
	}
}
